name: Hercules
biography: Born in Ancient Greece, Hercules is a demigod born to Zeus - The king of Olympic Gods - and Alcmena, a woman of Thebes. As an infant. Hercules was cared for by his stepmother Hera. Queen of the Olumpian Gods, and bestowed with her blessings These blessings further elevated his demigod physiology to near Godlike heights, providing him with inmmense strength, stamina, immortality, and near invulnerability

signatureAbility.name: Son of Zeus
bonuses: Once per fight when receiving damage that would result in a knockout, gain an Inmortality Buff preventing death and making Hercules Unblockable for 9.00 secons. Inmortality is paused during personal Special Attacks or while lending Basic Attacks and is removed if the Opponent activates their Special Attack 3.
For 2 seconds after completing a feat, gain 35% Combat Power Rate

specialAttacks.name: Master of Pankration
specialAttacks.description: Hercules pummels his opponent with a series of punches finishing with a swift lariat

bonuses.description: On Activation gain a True Sense Buff, bypassing the effects of Miss and Auto Block for 16 seconds
The first hit grants a precisio Buff increasing Critical Raiting by +2250 for 25 seconds. If this attack was used to intercept a dashing Opponents gain +2 additional Precision Buffs

specialAttacks.name: Mace Cyclone
specialAttacks.description: Using his mace to knock the opponent back in a powerful upward sweep, Hercules enters a spinning flurry of deadly mace strikes, finishing with a skillful mace toss

bonuses.description: The Potency of Burst Damage dealt via Strength during this attack is increased by 50% for each Armor-Up effect on the Opponent, up to a maximum increase of 200%.
The first hit grants a Cruelty Buff increasing Critical Damage Rating by +1321.43 for 15 seconds. If this attack was used to intercept a dashing Opponent gain +2 additional Cruelty Buffs
The final hit has a 100% chance to inflict a 3 seconds Stun Debuff

specialAttacks.name: Home Run
specialAttacks.description: Demonstrating his strength as an Olympian demigod, Hercules throws the opponent in air before delivering a bone crushing mace whack

bonuses.description: Gain a Indestructible Buff preventing all damage for 4 seconds
After this attack, if the Opponent has 3 Bars of Power Hercules gains a Power Gain Buff, granting 100% of a Bar of Power over 3 seconds
